name: Advanced Language Practice: Written French
description: Consolidation of writing skills already acquired by students specializing in French studies, with emphasis on advanced writing techniques. [12L, 24P]
prerequisites: Placement Test results/FRE283H5, FRE280Y5 or a minimum grade of 77% in FSL406H5 or equivalent.
exclusions: FSL382H5/FRE380H5/FSL442H1, high school French Baccalaureate. Open to francophones with permission of the department.
